I was very sceptical about buying this game; I watched people play it and the premise of the game seemed dull to me. But after so many recommendations from friends I eventually caved in and i have to say i am pleasantly surprised. 

While it isn't perfect I have thoroughly enjoyed playing thus far and there's room for a lot of variety with the different killers and survivors alike with unique abilities. I'll update this review once i've played for longer but for a game to keep me invested for 75 hours in a single week i have to give it credit and now i feel like exploring some of the many DLC survivor/killers available!

Раньше, из-за перхоти, я не мог носить чёрный кожак, здороваться с братками. Потом один из моих братков посоветовал мне шампунь "Жумайсынба". После первого применения я увидел результат и теперь я могу спокойно здороваться с братками и радоваться жизни! Шампунь "Жумайсынба" - скажи перхоти "Көзмей көрбейтін бол эй, түсіндім ба?!"
Ну а игра в целом хорошая, был бы компьтер мощнее, было бы гораздо интереснее.

Dead by Daylight is a fun, scary and strategic game with a closely knitted community of players.

Pros:
-Simple Gameplay 
-Very simple but interesting lore
-Easy to understand perks and abilities
-Fast Pace
-Lots of new characters and events
-Cool Maps and map mechanics
-Fun with Friends
-Collectible cosmetics from the rift

Con:
-Rarely but can be buggy

This is a really fun game to play with your friends.  My solo play experience has been limited, but with buddies its really fun.  Some of the hunters are really annoying to deal with, and sometimes I feel like the matchmaking doesn't take things like character levels and profile rank into account because I've been hunting on a fresh hunter at the begining of my game and run up on really high rank/level people.

If you get salty for losing easily, I wouldn't reccomend it though.

O jogo é no estilo competitivo 4vs1. Você pode iniciar como sobrevivente ou como assassino, cada personagem tem suas vantagens e as mesmas podem ser ensinadas para outros personagens ao chegar em um certo nível no seu personagem.
De sobrevivente, a sua missão é fazer 5 geradores com outras 3 pessoas e escapar pelos portões de saídas ou pela escotilha, no mapa há barricadas e janelas que podem ser usadas para você escapar do assassino.
De assassino, sua missão é fazer o máximo de sacrifícios nos ganchos, ou seja, matar até 4 sobreviventes para satisfazer a entidade, o assassino pode ir atras dos sobreviventes e enganchá-los nos ganchos próximos (que são mostrados enquanto você carrega alguém), cada assassino tem seu poder e diferente dos sobreviventes, esse poder não pode ser ensinado para outros personagens. O seu objetivo é impedir os sobreviventes de fazer os 5 geradores e escaparem.

É um jogo excelente, mesmo contendo bugs e erros (que é normal em todo jogo), você pode se entreter muito com ele. Tendo 3 modos de jogos que são: SWF (Sobrevivência com seus amigos ou jogar sozinho de sobrevivente), KYF (é o modo customizado, nele é tudo liberado e não é rankeado) e de Killer (onde você pode jogar como assassino).
Quando você é iniciante no jogo, ele te dá o rank 20, que é sua classificação, quanto mais você jogar, mais pontos (bips) ganhará e com isso seu rank diminuirá, chegando ao máximo de 1. (Isso serve tanto para sobrevivente quanto para assassino).

Recomendo esse jogo, além de ser viciante, muitos que não gostavam e jogaram, acabaram gostando. Ele está em constante promoções, eventos e atualizações. É isso, obrigado pra quem leu tudo kkkk.
Jogo muito bacana! Vale a pena. rsrsrs

Fun game very addicting, but there are some huge flaws that brings the game way down, The hitboxes for the killers are horrible they are way too inconsistent in most cases, Matchmaking is next It takes about a minute to load in as survivor BUT somehow the killer matchmaking takes 30 minutes and It is INSANITY!

These flaws are HUGE issues that need to be fixed.

BUT if you can look past these 2 issues then this is a very fun game with and without friends so human slugs like me and actual humans can enjoy this.
It will ruin your life.

Im gesamten bietet dieses Spiel nur schlechtes worauf man sich nicht freuen wird, deshalb empfehle ich keinen dieses Spiel weiter!

Great game if you wanna slowly lose your sanity. If you're a horror fan you will definitely like this game, but beware of the toxicity and prepare yourself to rage. There is still a lot of room for improvement but it's an enjoyable game, and one of the few games that got me addicted after a long time. Sadly, they've been ruining the game recently, and we there hasn't been good new survivors and killers, but if you are brand new to the game and have friends to play with it's a good choice.

I didn't spend money on this game for them to go support NFTs...

Boons are broken, some killers need serious rework (I mean Sadako... really? she has absolutely no chase power.... I'd rank her with Pig at the lowest tier).
And I'm telling you this as a surv main.

Apart from that it's a really nice game. Yes, there are lots of issues and yes, the devs don't always seem to get their own game which is reflected in some very bad decisions but it's really fun to master it. Prepare for investing a few hundred or thousand hours play time if you really want to be good at it (I'm still shit btw). So I recommend it to anyone searching for a new main game which is a bit more complex than it looks. Just give it a try.
Интересная хорошо проработанная игра, я всё.

Если вы когда-нибудь хотели ощутить себя в шкуре школьника из американских ужастиков или маньяка из тех же фильмов, то обязательно купите эту игру. Вы не пожалеете. Одно из самых ценных открытий лета 2016. Понастоящему пугающая атмосфера, которая держит тебя в напряжении до самого конца; неподдельный азарт, когда ты рыщешь в поисках свежей крови и пытаешься стать высшим хищником, коего никто не сумел обмануть.
Игра не обделена RPG-элементом и кастомизацией персонажей (включая трех милашек маньяков). Большое количество перков и расходных материалов позволят вам подогнать чара под себя.
Игра за выживших - настоящий хоррор, в котором вам придется действовать сообща, а иначе вас ждет мучительная смерть на мясницком крюке. Вас всегда будет преследовать ужас в виде кровожадного маньяка, который управляется живым игроком, не прощающим ошибок.
Игра за маньяка - бескомпромиссная жестокая охота, в которой вам понадобиться ваш интеллект и смекалка. Вам все время придеться думать о том, куда побегут ваши жертвы, чтобы их поймать. Вы будете устраивать засады и ставить ловушки, будете гнаться за ними с заведенной бензопилой и все это ради того, чтобы ни одна "свинка" не посмела сбежать с вашей фермы.
Задумка: 10/10
Реализация: 8/10
Амтосфера: бесценно.
